Name: Shape Cascade
About the game: Test your skills with this fast-paced arcade game. Put the falling shapes into their right place as fast as you can, but be careful: more shapes will fall down while the level goes on... Try to get first place in the world rank leaderboard! 15 different levels to play Each shape has its own physics! Random power-ups will drop down to help you! catch them all! Unlock many different cursors to push the shapes better! Steam Leaderboard Each shape goes into the correct space Can you catch that annoying little man laughing? There are also some bonus like Extra Time!
